name: change variable
content:
Adds the specified number to the value currently assigned to a variable.

The value of the variable is set to the sum of its current value and the specified number. If the variable does not currently have a numerical value, the specified value will be assigned to the variable directly.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: Read and run this code to see how changing a variable works.

examples.name: Example 2
examples.description: These chicks spread quickly! Each time a chick is clicked, it increases the number of new chicks made by 2.

palette_params.name: number
palette_params.description: The amount to add to the value of the variable

palette_params.name: variable name
palette_params.description: The name of the variable whose value is being changed

short_description: Adds the specified number to the value currently assigned to a variable.
